sentences.sContent: He accused me of slandering him and trying to undermine his position.
sentences.sCn: 他指控我诽谤他并想削弱他的地位。

words.tran: 诽谤的；诽谤性的；中伤的
诽谤地；造谣中伤地；恶毒地

trans.tranOther: to say false things about someone in order to damage other people’s good opinion of them
a false spoken statement about someone, intended to damage the good opinion that people have of that person
